name: The Anime Store
description:
Children can be a blessing and a curse, and you are cursed with having a son that's an 'oh-tack-u' (are you saying that right...?). But you love him, so you do your best to go get whatever he asks you for!

It's unfortunate that most of what he wants are these anime girls that all seem kind of the same to you. But you're sure after taking some notes you'll be able to get the anime toys he wants, right...?

Credits:

Autumn Greenley@autumnotopiadev on TwitterRobert Hudspethsounddude47 on SoundCloudVee Nowell@VeeGameDev on TwitterAbby Palmawww.heyabigailrenee.com/Andrew Tran@bearlovingnerd on Twitter

We plan on adding more content to this game for the PIGSquad Summer Slow Jam Showcase next month, so stay tuned!
